title: Basic Use
code: # All colors uafcolors() ##  [1] "#236192" "#FFCD00" "#71984A" "#DF6A2E" "#87D1E6" "#F45197" "#111C4E" ##  [8] "#774D28" "#66665D" "#F6DFA4" "#C4CFDA" "#C8C8C8" # Single color uafcolors("blue") ## [1] "#236192" uafcolors("gold") ## [1] "#FFCD00"

title: Basic Use
code: barplot(1:12, col = uafcolors(), border = NA, main = "UAF Colors") hist(iris$Sepal.Length, col = uafcolors("blue"), border = "white",      main = "Histogram", xlab = "Sepal Length") plot(iris$Sepal.Length, iris$Sepal.Width,      col = uafcolors()[as.numeric(iris$Species)],      pch = 19, main = "Scatter Plot",      xlab = "Sepal Length", ylab = "Sepal Width")

title: Basic Use
code: library(ggplot2)  ggplot(iris, aes(Sepal.Length, Sepal.Width, color = Species)) +   geom_point(size = 3) +   scale_color_uaf() +   theme_uaf() +   labs(title = "Iris Data") ggplot(mpg, aes(class, fill = class)) +   geom_bar() +   scale_fill_uaf() +   theme_uaf() +   labs(title = "Vehicle Classes") +   theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1))

title: Stata Usage
text: Install UAF graph scheme Stata: manually copy scheme-uaf.scheme Stata ado folder: Windows: C:\ado\plus\s\ Mac: ~/Library/Application Support/Stata/ado/plus/s/ Linux: ~/ado/plus/s/

title: Stata Usage
code: set scheme uaf set scheme uaf, permanently

title: Stata Usage
code: sysuse auto, clear scatter mpg weight, title("Scatter Plot")

title: Stata Usage
code: graph bar (mean) mpg, over(foreign) title("Bar Chart")

title: Stata Usage
code: graph box mpg, over(rep78) title("Box Plot")

title: Stata Usage
code: twoway (scatter mpg weight if foreign==0) ///        (scatter mpg weight if foreign==1), ///        legend(label(1 "Domestic") label(2 "Foreign")) ///        title("Multiple Series")

title: Stata Usage
text: White background Horizontal grid lines Clean, professional appearance

title: Authors and Citation

code: @Manual{,   title = {{uafcolors}: University of Alaska Fairbanks Colors for {R} and {Stata}},   author = {Raymond Dacosta Azadda and Andrew Grogan-Kaylor and KyungSook Lee},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 1.0},   url = {https://github.com/rdazadda/UAF-color-scheme}, }

what: UAF Colors for R and Stata
title: UAF Colors for R and Stata
text: University Alaska Fairbanks color schemes R Stata. Colors UAF Brand Guidelines.

title: UAF Colors for R and Stata
UAF Colors for R and Stata
code: library(uafcolors)  # All colors barplot(1:12, col = uafcolors())  # Single color hist(rnorm(100), col = uafcolors("blue"))  # ggplot2 library(ggplot2) ggplot(iris, aes(Sepal.Length, Sepal.Width, color = Species)) +   geom_point() +   scale_color_uaf() +   theme_uaf()

title: UAF Colors for R and Stata
UAF Colors for R and Stata
code: set scheme uaf  sysuse auto, clear scatter mpg weight graph bar (mean) mpg, over(foreign) histogram mpg

title: UAF Colors for R and Stata
